Name: Emulate reduced transparency
Description: Can I emulate reduced transparency CSS media feature?

Notes: 1. Open **Command Menu** (`Cmd+Shift+P` or `Ctrl+Shift+P`) > Run "Show Rendering". Scroll down to the **Emulate CSS media** features section and select `prefers-reduced-transparency: reduce` to apply the effect.
References: 1. "Emulate prefers-reduced-transparency media feature", [What's New in DevTools (Chrome 118)](https://developer.chrome.com/blog/new-in-devtools-118/#reduced-transparency).
